name: Healing OR
description:
A game about a doctor struggling for health for everybody. Here you can wonder around a hospital. During your missions there will be some medicine on the floor. So you can grab it to help your patients.

Controlls:

Movement - WASD

Starting a dialogue(if there is a visual cue above the character) - R

Making a choice - use arrows to choose; use Enter to continue dialogue;

To pick up a medicine just get closer to the item icon.
